00052 void ServerConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00053 
00054   HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00055 
00056   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00057     ApplicationHandler *handler = 0;
00058     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00059     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00060 
00061     try {
00062 
00063       // sanity check command code
00064       if (event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00065         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00066                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00067 
00068       switch (event->header.command) {
00069       case Protocol::COMMAND_HANDSHAKE: {
00070           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00071           m_session_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00072           if (m_session_id == 0)
00073             HT_THROW(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Bad session id: 0");
00074 
00075           cb.response_ok();
00076         }
00077         return;
00078       case Protocol::COMMAND_OPEN:
00079         handler = new RequestHandlerOpen(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00080                                          m_session_id, event);
00081         break;
00082       case Protocol::COMMAND_CLOSE:
00083         handler = new RequestHandlerClose(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00084                                           m_session_id, event);
00085         break;
00086       case Protocol::COMMAND_MKDIR:
00087         handler = new RequestHandlerMkdir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00088                                           m_session_id, event);
00089         break;
00090       case Protocol::COMMAND_DELETE:
00091         handler = new RequestHandlerDelete(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00092                                            m_session_id, event);
00093         break;
00094       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRSET:
00095         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrSet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00096                                             m_session_id, event);
00097         break;
00098       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRGET:
00099         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrGet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00100                                             m_session_id, event);
00101         break;
00102       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRDEL:
00103         handler = new RequestHandlerAttrDel(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00104                                             m_session_id, event);
00105         break;
00106       case Protocol::COMMAND_EXISTS:
00107         handler = new RequestHandlerExists(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00108                                            m_session_id, event);
00109         break;
00110       case Protocol::COMMAND_READDIR:
00111         handler = new RequestHandlerReaddir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00112                                             m_session_id, event);
00113         break;
00114       case Protocol::COMMAND_LOCK:
00115         handler = new RequestHandlerLock(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00116                                          m_session_id, event);
00117         break;
00118       case Protocol::COMMAND_RELEASE:
00119         handler = new RequestHandlerRelease(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00120                                             m_session_id, event);
00121         break;
00122       case Protocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00123         handler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00124                                            m_session_id, event);
00125         break;
00126       default:
00127         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00128                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00129       }
00130       m_app_queue_ptr->add(handler);
00131     }
00132     catch (Exception &e) {
00133       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00134       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00135       String errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00136       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00137     }
00138   }
00139   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00140     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00141   }
00142   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::DISCONNECT) {
00143     m_master_ptr->destroy_session(m_session_id);
00144     cout << flush;
00145   }
00146   else {
00147     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00148   }
00149 
00150 }
